title: About Libribooks
content:
At Libribooks, we believe that books are more than just paper and ink (or pixels on a screen). They are portals to other worlds, sources of immense knowledge, and catalysts for personal growth. Our passion for reading is what brought this project to life.

We started as a small group of friends who loved discussing our latest reads. We wanted to create a beautiful, simple, and inspiring space online to share our reviews and help others find their next literary adventure.

This website is our labor of love, built to be a cozy and welcoming place for book lovers of all kinds.

title: Get In Touch
content: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, a book suggestion, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out.

title: Frequently Asked Questions
content: Have questions? We have answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact us.

structuredContent.question: What is libribooks.com?
structuredContent.answer: libribooks.com is a website dedicated to providing insightful book reviews, recommendations, and a community for book lovers to discover their next great read.

structuredContent.question: How do you choose which books to review?
structuredContent.answer: Our team of avid readers selects books across a wide range of genres, focusing on both new releases and timeless classics. We also take suggestions from our community!

structuredContent.question: Can I submit my own book for review?
structuredContent.answer: While we don't currently have a formal submission process, we're always on the lookout for new and exciting books. Feel free to reach out to us via our contact page with your book's information.

structuredContent.question: How does the AI-generated summary work?
structuredContent.answer: We use a state-of-the-art language model to create concise summaries of our longer reviews. This provides a quick overview for readers who are short on time, while still offering the option to read the full, in-depth review.

structuredContent.question: Is libribooks.com free to use?
structuredContent.answer: Yes, our website is completely free for all users. We are supported by affiliate commissions from the 'Buy Now' links, which come at no extra cost to you.

title: Cookie Policy
content:
Last updated: July 30, 2024

Introduction

libribooks.com ("we", "our", "us") uses cookies on our website. By using the website, you consent to the use of cookies.

Our Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use cookies, how third-parties we may partner with may use cookies on the website, your choices regarding cookies, and further information about cookies.

What are cookies

Cookies are small pieces of text sent by your web browser by a website you visit. A cookie file is stored in your web browser and allows the website or a third-party to recognize you and make your next visit easier and the website more useful to you.

How we use cookies

When you use and access the website, we may place a number of cookies files in your web browser. We use cookies for the following purposes:

  • To enable certain functions of the website
  • To provide analytics
  • To store your preferences

Third-party cookies

In addition to our own cookies, we may also use various third-parties cookies to report usage statistics of the website, deliver advertisements on and through the website, and so on.

What are your choices regarding cookies

If you'd like to delete cookies or instruct your web browser to delete or refuse cookies, please visit the help pages of your web browser. Please note, however, that if you delete cookies or refuse to accept them, you might not be able to use all of the features we offer, you may not be able to store your preferences, and some of our pages might not display properly.

Where can you find more information about cookies

You can learn more about cookies at the following third-party websites:

  • AllAboutCookies: http://www.allaboutcookies.org/
  • Network Advertising Initiative: http://www.networkadvertising.org/
